Package components.englishAuction

Class EnglishBidder

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
components.englishAuction.EnglishBidder
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
public class EnglishBidder extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
Class that represent an English bidder component, this class is supposed to allow bidder to make offers
Author:
Malik Bouaoud and Sandrine Ear
